title: [Gyldemar Forest, Decrepit Shack]
description: Bone-white birch trees stand guard around a small clearing in the woods, their scale-like shards of bark warping with age to reveal the darker wood beneath.  A thin breeze rustles their dry leaves, sending a whisper through the quiet woods.  A decrepit shack, battered by weather and the weight of time, leans against a particularly stout trunk, as if begging the tree itself for support.  The roof of the shack, apparently formed from sewn sheets of tanned animal hide, lies in tatters.

Pale birch trees stand guard around a small clearing in the woods, their scale-like shards of bark warping with age to reveal the darker wood beneath.
